00030 #ifndef ZOOMPARAMETERS_H
00031 #define ZOOMPARAMETERS_H
00032 
00033 //
00034 //  W A R N I N G
00035 //  -------------
00036 //
00037 // This file is not part of the KD Chart API.  It exists purely as an
00038 // implementation detail.  This header file may change from version to
00039 // version without notice, or even be removed.
00040 //
00041 // We mean it.
00042 //
00043 
00044 namespace KDChart {
00049     class ZoomParameters {
00050     public:
00051         ZoomParameters()
00052         : xFactor( 1.0 ),
00053           yFactor( 1.0 ),
00054           xCenter( 0.5 ),
00055           yCenter( 0.5)
00056         {
00057         }
00058 
00059         ZoomParameters( double xFactor, double yFactor, const QPointF& center )
00060         : xFactor( xFactor ),
00061           yFactor( yFactor ),
00062           xCenter( center.x() ),
00063           yCenter( center.y() )
00064         {
00065         }
00066 
00067         void setCenter( const QPointF& center )
00068         {
00069             xCenter = center.x();
00070             yCenter = center.y();
00071         }
00072         const QPointF center() const
00073         {
00074             return QPointF( xCenter, yCenter );
00075         }
00076 
00077         double xFactor;
00078         double yFactor;
00079 
00080         double xCenter;
00081         double yCenter;
00082     };
00083 }
00084 
00085 #endif
